prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and a relaxed demeanor.
Imagine an aquatic creature that evolves from a small pink blob into a large green beast.
Design a Pokemon that loves to lounge and has a unique shell on its back.
Give me a Slowbro-like Pokemon that has a playful personality and enjoys the beach.
Show me a creature that embodies calmness and has both green and pink features.
Generate a Pokemon with a round shape, a big smile, and a soft, squishy body.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that can be found near water, looking for snacks.
